message: Let's be fair and start with a reasonable split. 60 for me, 40 for you.
Your offer was a bit unfair, how about we split the difference? This seems fair considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was generous. Meet me in the middle of our previous offers.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I'm offering a deal that's good for both of us. Let's not get greedy.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Inflation is hitting me harder, after all.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's be reasonable and split this almost evenly.  Take it before inflation eats away any more of the pie!
